1370: Abelkijn moved to Die lange straet3.E.8 after marriage.
Got married to Hersewindis at age 36 in 1370.
Had a son with Hersewindis, Vandelghis, at age 36.
1371: Had a daughter with Hersewindis, Natelien, at age 37.
1372: Lost son Vandelghis when Vandelghis was 3 years old.
1373: Had a daughter with Hersewindis, Meynseth, at age 39.
1374: Had a son with Hersewindis, Batten, at age 40.
1375: Had a son with Hersewindis, Evergero, at age 41.
1377: Had a son with Hersewindis, Barwoud, at age 43.
